about_the_game:
This Extra Ninjutsu DLC will unlock new Ninjutsu for your own original ninja.

The Piercing One-Fingered Thrust of Hell will harness Lightning Style Chakra to unleash a sharp, one-fingered thrust - just like the Third Raikage!

Content includes:
- Ninjutsu: The Piercing One-Fingered Thrust of Hell (Attack Type)

*After downloading this content, open the game and navigate to the Add-Ons section in the Gift Box at the Inn inside The Village Hidden in the Leaves online lobby.
*Upon receipt, the purchased Ninjutsu will be immediately usable.
*This content is limited to Ninjutsu only. It does not include new VR Masters or Training Rank rewards.

The Piercing One-Fingered Thrust of Hell will harness Lightning Style Chakra to unleash a sharp, one-fingered thrust - just like the Third Raikage!

*After downloading this content, open the game and navigate to the Add-Ons section in the Gift Box at the Inn inside The Village Hidden in the Leaves online lobby.
*Upon receipt, the purchased Ninjutsu will be immediately usable.
*This content is limited to Ninjutsu only. It does not include new VR Masters or Training Rank rewards.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
